gurmukhi: ਪਸੂ ਖੜਿ ਖਾਤ ਖਲ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਹੀਨ ਮੋਨਿ ਕੋ ਮਹਾਤਮੁ ਪੈ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਪ੍ਵਾਹ ਜੀ
transliteration: Pasoo Kharhi Khaat Khal Sabad Surati Heena , Moni Ko Mahaatamu Pai Anmrit Pravaah Jee ?
translation: An animal eats green grass and hay. He is bereft of all knowledge of Lord's word. Due to his inability to speak, gives nectar-like milk.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਨਾ ਮਿਸਟਾਨ ਖਾਨ ਪਾਨ ਮਾਨਸ ਮੁਖ ਰਸਨਾ ਰਸੀਲੀ ਹੋੲਿ ਸੋੲੀ ਭਲੀ ਤਾਹਿ ਜੀ
transliteration: Naanaa Misataan Khaan Paan Maanas Moukha , Rasanaa Raseelee Hoi Soee Bhalee Taahi Jee ?
translation: A man eats and enjoys many types of food materials with his tongue but he becomes praiseworthy only if his tongue is sweetened with the sweetness of Lord's name.

gurmukhi: ਬਚਨ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਟੇਕ ਮਾਨਸ ਜਨਮ ਫਲ ਬਚਨ ਬਿਹੂਨ ਪਸੁ ਪਰਮਿਤਿ ਅਾਹਿ ਜੀ
transliteration: Bachan Bibayk Tayk Maanas Janam Dhala , Bachan Bihoon Pasu Paramiti Aahi Jee ?
translation: Purpose of human life is to take refuge in the meditation of His Naam. But one devoid of the teachings of the True Guru is the worst kind of animal.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਨਸ ਜਨਮ ਗਤਿ ਬਚਨ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਹੀਨ ਬਿਖਧਰ ਬਿਖਮ ਚਕਤ ਚਿਤੁ ਚਾਹਿ ਜੀ ||੨੦੨||
transliteration: Maanas Janam Gati Bachan Bibayk Heena , Bikhadhar Bikham Chakat Chitu Chaahi Jee ?202?
translation: One who is bereft of teachings of True Guru, craves and wanders in search of worldly pleasure and remains vexed for their acquisition. His state is like a dangerous poisonous snake. (202)
